column6: What are you creating/testing and what gives you the confidence this test will improve overall performance?
column10:
Benefit
Focus on pain points and objections to determine which benefits to highlight.
Example: If the persona fears damage, emphasize non-damaging, lightweight design, and scalp comfort.
